name: Provençal Ratatouille
description: A taste of summer! Double the recipe and use leftovers in Sylvie’s Provençal Ratatouille Pie.
preparation: Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic. Sauté until they begin to soften.
Add tomato paste, Souvlaki Seasoning, Herbes Provençales, and zucchini. Stir and cook 5 minutes.
Add peppers and tomatoes. Cook for 20 minutes, uncovered, stirring often.
Season with Sea Salt and Black Pepper and serve.
tips: For a twist, try Epicure Herb & Garlic Dip Mix, Pesto Sauce Mix, or any of your favourite Epicure sauce mixes.
Serve as a side dish, a light, warming meal, or tossed with pasta.

products.name: Sea Salt (Grinder)
summary: Crisp, clean salt from the sea.

products.name: Black Pepper (Grinder)
summary: Customizable ceramic grinder adjusts to coarse or fine grind.
